titleStmt.title: A treatise of the covenant of grace, as it is dispensed to the elect seed, effectually unto salvation. Being the substance of divers sermons preached upon Act. 7. 8. / by that eminently holy and judicious man of God, Mr. John Cotton, teacher of the church at Boston in N.E.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, John, 1584-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ja. Cottrel, for John Allen, at the Rising-Sun in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: License to print on verso of A1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
